title: Without Wout, Can Matteo Jorgenson Lead Visma-Lease a Bike at Tour of Flanders? ‘We Have to Make the Best of It’
content:
American recruit boldly steps into the Visma-Lease a Bike void with another stunning victory: 'Winning was a nice gesture for Wout.'

Read the full article at Without Wout, Can Matteo Jorgenson Lead Visma-Lease a Bike at Tour of Flanders? ‘We Have to Make the Best of It’ on Velo.
author: ahood
